mapper.select: select * from pet order by pet_owner asc, pet_no asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PET (PET_NO, PET_OWNER, PET_KIND, PET_VARIETY, PET_NAME, PET_AGE, PET_GENDER, PET_COMMENT) VALUES ((select nvl(max(PET_NO), 0)+1 from PET), #{PET_OWNER}, #{PET_KIND}, #{PET_VARIETY}, #{PET_NAME}, #{PET_AGE}, #{PET_GENDER}, #{PET_COMMENT})
